lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/duke.Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run duke.Duke.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:
System.out.println("Please key in proper task descriptions!!");
System.out.println("Niceeee!!I've marked this task as done: ");
System.out.println("Please key in the correct task index");
System.out.println("You have already completed the task leh!");
System.out.println("Please key in the correct task index");
System.out.println("You have not completed the task:(");
System.out.println("Sorry, there is no task in your list");
System.out.println("Please key in the correct task index");
public Event(String description, String startTime, String endTime) {
"Nice! I've marked this task as done: ";
public String showAcknowledgement(String fixedMessage, int taskIndex) {
public Task findTask(int taskIndex) throws TaskException {
public String addDeadline(String description, String by) {
public String addEvent(String description, String from, String to) {
public String deleteTask(int taskIndex) throws TaskOutOfBoundsException {
public void markAsDone(int taskIndex) throws TaskException, TaskDoneException {
public void markAsUndone(int taskIndex) throws TaskException, TaskUndoneException {
private static final String OPENING_LINE = "Hello! I'm duke.Duke"
+ "What can I do for you? Type 'help' for the command list";
"Bye. Hope to see you again soon!";
private static final String ERROR = "Hey! Error!";
private static final String HELP = "    todo {description} --add todo" + System.lineSeparator()
+ "    mark {task serial number} --mark the task as done" + System.lineSeparator()
+ "    unmark {task serial number} --mark the task as undone" + System.lineSeparator()
+ "    list --to show the current task list";
